description: Middlesbrough have reportedly renewed their interest in Hull City left-back Ryan Giles.
title: Hull City left-back Giles wanted by Boro
title_page: Hull City left-back Giles wanted by Boro - gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Middlesbrough have renewed their interest in Hull City left-back Ryan Giles and want to sign the 24-year-old in January. (HullLive), external
Meanwhile, the Tigers are close to the loan signing of Leeds United forward Joe Gelhardt - who was wanted by ambitious League One side Wrexham. (Goal), external
